summary_md: Ukraine's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP (2,219 USD per person), with an inflation rate (6.50%) and a percentage of the population employed (9.83%). The average life expectancy (73.42 years) and internet user penetration (82.40%) are also notable aspects. The country's export growth (29.41%) reflects its economic dynamics.
